when he uses your code while subscribing to a new plan. The user needs to enter and apply the code on the payment page.
\nUser Benefits\nThe user will get discount when he uses your code while subscribing to a new plan. The user needs to enter and apply the code on the payment page.

\nYour Benefits\nWhen a user completes the subscription purchase by using your referral (coupon) code, then you will get the following free benefits which includes additional Daily, Weekly, and Festival Posts along with validity.

Your Benefits
When a user completes the subscription purchase by using your referral (coupon) code, then you will get the following free benefits.

Note 
1. You can not use your own referral (coupon) code. 
2. You can send referral (coupon) code to any number of persons. 
3. An user can redeem the referral (coupon) code only once (for one successful plan subscription). 
4. However, if you want to enjoy the free benefits, you can send your referral (coupon) code to as many persons as you can. 
5. The free benefits will be added to you every time when a user buys any subscription plan using your referral (coupon) code. 
6. All the free benefits will be canceled when you are upgrading to a higher subscription plan.
I agree all Terms and Conditions.
